add.description: Add a member to a ticket
add.name: add

member.description: The member to add to the ticket
member.name: member

ticket.description: The ticket to add the member to
ticket.name: ticket

no_member.description: Please mention the member you want to add.
no_member.title: ‚ùå Unknown member

no_permission.description: You are not the creator of this ticket and you are not a staff member; you can't add members to this ticket.
no_permission.title: ‚ùå Insufficient permission

not_a_ticket.description: Please use this command in the ticket channel, or mention the channel.

add.description: Add a member or role to the blacklist
add.name: add

member_or_role.description: The member or role to add to the blacklist
member_or_role.name: member_or_role

remove.description: Remove a member or role from the blacklist
remove.name: remove

member_or_role.description: The member or role to remove from the blacklist
member_or_role.name: member_or_role

show.description: Show the members and roles in the blacklist
show.name: show

empty_list.description: There are no members or roles blacklisted. Type `/blacklist add` to add a member or role to the blacklist.
empty_list.title: üìÉ Blacklisted members and roles

illegal_action.description: %s is a staff member and cannot be blacklisted.
illegal_action.title: ‚ùå You can't blacklist this member

invalid.description: This member or role can not be removed from the blacklist as they are not blacklisted.
invalid.title: ‚ùå Error

member_added.description: <@%s> has been added to the blacklist. They will no longer be able to interact with the bot.
member_added.title: ‚úÖ Added member to blacklist

member_removed.description: <@%s> has been removed from the blacklist. They can now use the bot again.
member_removed.title: ‚úÖ Removed member from blacklist

role_added.description: <@&%s> has been added to the blacklist. Members with this role will no longer be able to interact with the bot.
role_added.title: ‚úÖ Added role to blacklist

role_removed.description: <@&%s> has been removed from the blacklist. Members with this role can now use the bot again.
role_removed.title: ‚úÖ Removed role from blacklist

reason.description: The reason for closing the ticket(s)
reason.name: reason

ticket.description: The ticket to close, either the number or the channel ID
ticket.name: ticket

time.description: Close all tickets that have been inactive for the specified time
time.name: time

confirm.description_with_archive: The ticket will be archived for future reference.
confirm.title: ‚ùî Are you sure?

description: You are about to close %d ticket.
You are about to close %d tickets.

confirmation_timeout.description: You took too long to confirm.
confirmation_timeout.title: ‚ùå Interaction time expired

invalid_time.description: The time period provided could not be parsed.
invalid_time.title: ‚ùå Invalid input

no_permission.description: You are not a staff member or the ticket creator.
no_permission.title: ‚ùå Insufficient permission

no_tickets.description: There are no tickets which have been inactive for this time period.
no_tickets.title: ‚ùå No tickets to close

not_a_ticket.description:
Please use this command in a ticket channel or use the ticket flag.
Type `/help close` for more information.
not_a_ticket.title: ‚ùå This isn't a ticket channel

unresolvable.description: `%s` could not be resolved to a ticket. Please provide the ticket ID/mention or number.
unresolvable.title: ‚ùå Error

help.description: List the commands you have access to

list.description: The commands you have access to are listed below. To create a ticket, type **`/new`**.

request_topic.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Ticket topic

%s

no_categories.description: A server administrator must create at least one ticket category before a new ticket can be opened.
no_categories.title: ‚ùå Can't create ticket

select_category.title: üî§ Please select the ticket category

too_many_categories.title: ‚ùå Too many categories
